amathyansha piriwen shakhawa thula wishaya upadeshakawaru saha sambandhikarana katayuthu sandaha piriwen guruwaru anuyuktha kara pradhana lipikaru athulu karya mandalaya katayuthu karanu labe.bandula gunawardhana adhyapana amathyathuma saha adhyapana amathyanshaye lekam anura disanayaka mahatha mema piriwen shakhawa pilibanda wishesha awadhanaya yomu kara awashya pahasukam salasa denu labe.2013 adhyapana amathyanshaye paladayitha agayime wadasatahana amathyanshaye shakha 45 ka pamana adhikshanaya kara piriwen shakhawata mewara 5 wana sthanaya himikara ganimata ithihasaye palamuwarata hakiwima pilibanda apa sathutu wiya yuthuya.me wasare sita piriwen wadasatahan palath adhyapana adhyakshawarunge adhikshanaya yatathe sidukirimata apeksha kare.
namuth age anga pasanga wimalata samana nathayi da hingannata sithuni.
happe onna anthimata kohoma kohoma hari lawak dewak nathuwa panduru rasiyak kariya thalala ehema aapahu kathawata antar una kiyamuko.
heta thawa kenek mage thana ganiwi.
ohu mage hithawathek.

nawatha dinak mihiri palapala ha nelumbau dali pokuru mi ha ekwa yoda pansiyayak pase buduwarayan wahansela walandawana ath rajjuruwanwa dutu chula subhadrawoth thaman lada mihiri palapaladiya pase buduwarayan wahanselata dandi mama mema aathma bhawayen chuthawa gos mandaraja kulayehi ipida subhadra raja kanyawa wadiwiya pamina baranas rajahata aga mehesiyawa ohuta kiya ek wadi puthrayeku mehi wimath pedesata yawa me ath rajahu wishapewu sarayakin wida jiwitha winashayata pamunuwa sawanak ras wihiduna wu dalasangala genwaganta samath wemwa” ya kiya prarthana kalaya.

agramathya di. mu. jayarathna mahatha mehidi piliganime kathawa idiripath kala athara, amathyawarun wana nimal siripala da silwa, es. bi. disanayaka, ji. el. piris, lakshman yapa abewardhana, mahindananda aluthgamage, niyojya amathya arl gunasekara madhyama palath hitapu pradhana amathya sarath eekanayaka yana mahathwaruda mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.

nagarika manthri dhurayen illa aswime lipiya kolambaa nagara sabhawe komasariswarayata eeye (17 da) bara dun bawath ehi pitapathak janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha yomu kala bawath asad sali mahatha “diwayina” ta pawasiya.

me athara wyawastha katayuthu pilibanda wisheshagnyayeku wana aacharya jayampathi wikramarathna pasugiyada bibisi sinhala sewayata kiya sitiye kantha himikam sambandha parlimenthu anu kamituwedi muslim kriyakariniyange illima pilibandawa ekangathawak athi nowu bawaya.
namuth me aya ape thawa lamayi kattiyak wasikiliyakata aragena gihilla andum galawala rag karala thiyanawa.
mowun sandaha aasanna washayen dinakata ghana mitar 300,000k pamana pirisidu karana lada jala pramanayak sapayanu labe.
wadiduratath, ee mahatha kiya sitiye me nirdeshayan parani kathawakata anuwa eladena bedagaththa wage bawayi.
ee wasare mata labuna guruthumiya thamayi eekata hethuwa.
mandela nidahas karanna yayi lowa pura wishala handak nagenamin thibini.
passe, ethana idan api athuru paraka yamu.
mathaka thaba gatha yuthu wisheshama karanaya nam mahinda gedara gos sathi kipayak yana thuru mahinda nawatha gena eemata kiya wishesha rallak janathawa atharin mathuwa noaa bawayi.
rupa pettiye sanwardhanaya hinen dakina!
ranjan kiyana mage namayehi theruma rasa ganwanna kiyana arutha bawa mata dana ganna labuna.
eheth apata eya kirimata hakiyawa labuna.

me athara dematagoda praharaya pilibada methek anawaranaya nowu sisitiwi darshana pelak madhya wetha nikuth kirimata da pasku praharaya pilibada wimarshanaya kerena komishan sabhawa eeye (02) piyawara gaththa.
habayi wishwawidyala jiwithaya yanu ful tayim wishwawidyalaye sitima witharak ma nemeyi.
samahara madhya aayathana prashna kala hakiyi.
saba karanata ee sundara sihinaya..
ee nisa me kalabalakari minisunge hith wenuwen yamak kalayuthuwa kiyala mata hithuna.
awasana washayen amarathunga mahatha kiyanne jiwithaye eeniya arutha danan, ූnan protina nishpadanaya kirima bawa ya.
champa waha thama puthuge illima prathikshepa kalaya.‘ehenan ara thaththa nanne?’
